DOC.detailed_description: Control subject provide 3 different diet 2 week . At end diet period participant admit OHSU Clinical Translation Research Center ( CTRC ) blood sample every 30 minute 13.5 hour , measure level hormone . Participants also DXA scan measure body composition . PWS subject one admission eat standardize diet prepared caregiver 2 week .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 older . Weight stable least 3 month . At lifetime maximal body weight . Actively lose weight diet exercise . Smokers . Alcohol consumption > 2 drink per day . Exercise > 30 minute 3 time week . Prescription drug use ( except birth control pill , vitamin , mineral ) . Type 2 diabetes . Heart disease , cancer , malabsorptive state , chronic infection would affect body weight . Weight > 300 lb ( exceeds weight limit DEXA machine ) . Hemoglobin < 12.0 g/dL woman , < 13.5 g/dL men
